mean_cn: v.得到……的赞助或帮助；应募，招募，参加，加入
mean_en: to persuade somebody to help you or to join you in doing something; to join or to make somebody join the armed forces
sentence: He couldn't lift the rock alone so he enlisted the help of a few friends.
sentence_trans: 他一个人搬不动这块石头，所以他找了几个朋友来帮忙。
word_etyma: en使 + list列上 → enlist征募，入伍
